name: Isle of Lores
economy_niches: trade in sailing-lore manuscripts and diagrams
culture_adjustments: ritual seamanship infused with scholastic augury practices
clan-guild patronage favors lore-keepers over pure merchants
oral-archive emphasis; apprenticeships prioritize copying and memory
stricter vetting of outsiders and itinerant augurers
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: hosts lighthouse-chronicles used by state navigators
small, high-skilled shipwright workshops export decorative work
